title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When performing the ShiftLeft operation on a text with intermixed tabs and spaces, the behavior is unclear and sometimes confusing.
EB: The expected behavior is that when executing ShiftLeft on a text with intermixed tabs and spaces, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character (i.e., replacing the tab with spaces). Additionally, any stray spaces should be removed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a text document with intermixed tabs and spaces.
2. Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually.
3. Execute the ShiftLeft operation.
4. Observe if the text moves in the expected way.
